title: Super Villain
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You, like a fire in my throat
Can't say nothing, I choke
My words go up in smoke (Hey, hey, hey)
You, bring a darkness to a soul
And I'm losing control
But I can't ever let go
[Pre-Chorus]
I play you down, but you end up taking over
[Chorus]
This is the curse of a super villain
Hitten with Cupid's Arrow, killer
Pieces of a broken heart of
Super villain
Curse of a super villain
Could give it up, but I'm not willing
Ain't nobody else giving me this feeling
[Post-Chorus]
Supervillain, supervillain
Supervillain
[Verse 2]
Ooh, I can never get too much
I would ransom for your touch
But I just don't have enough (Hey, hey, hey)
Your smell lingers on my shirt
Truth is easy burnt
Without you, I'd be worse

[Pre-Chorus]
You're the talk of the town, and the words are taking over
[Chorus]
This is the curse of a super villain
Hitten with Cupid's Arrow, killer
Pieces of a broken heart of
Super villain
Curse of a super villain
Could give it up, but I'm not willing
Ain't nobody else giving me this feeling
[Bridge]
Oh, I would do time for you
Oh, boy, I'd go blind for you
Go out of my mind for you
Hey, yeah, yeah, I'd find myself crying for you
Yeah, I'd do the time for you
Go out of my mind for you
Hey, hey, hey, hey
[Chorus]
This is the curse of a super villain
Hitten with Cupid's Arrow, killer
Pieces of a broken heart of
Super villain
Curse of a super villain
Could give it up, but I'm not willing
Ain't nobody else giving me this feeling

[Post-Chorus]
Supervillain, supervillain
Supervillain
Supervillain, supervillain
Supervillain
Supervillain, supervillain
Supervillain
